resources.string: Press the button with the speaker to hear the word\'s pronunciation. Be careful: you will loose 10 points each time that you will press it!
If you solved the word in less than 15 seconds and that you did the same numbers of moves than the numbers of letters, you won 100 points !
If you solved the word in less than 30 seconds, you won 50 points !
If you solved the word in more than 30 seconds, you won 20 points !
Be careful: each time you use the hint, you lose 10 points!
Well done! A new category is now available!
The category Animals is unlocked at the beginning of the game
You need to have 500 points to unlock the category: Fruits and Vegetables
You need to have 2000 points to unlock the category: Home
You need to have 4000 points to unlock the category: Nature
You need to have 6000 points to unlock the category: Colors
You need to have 8000 points to unlock the category: Clothes
You need to have 12000 points to unlock the category: Health
You need to have 16000 points to unlock the category: Sports
To unlock a new level, you have to solve more than 20% of the words of the previous category.
The word disappeared of the words to find when you\'ve reached more than 2000 points for this word.
